PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-05122020-06-29FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectCUSMA Rules of Origin for Casual Goods Regulations
PrecisCUSMA RULES OF ORIGIN FOR CASUAL GOODS REGULATIONS in order to replace the NAFTA Rules of Origin for Casual Goods Regulations and establish that non-commercial goods acquired in another Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement (CUSMA) country that are either marked as made in a CUSMA country or not marked to the contrary, are considered originating and therefore entitled to the relevant CUSMA tariff preferences upon their importation into Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0156 Publication Date: 2020-07-22
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: CUSMA Rules of Origin for Casual Goods Regulations
precis: CUSMA RULES OF ORIGIN FOR CASUAL GOODS REGULATIONS in order to replace the NAFTA Rules of Origin for Casual Goods Regulations and establish that non-commercial goods acquired in another Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement (CUSMA) country that are either marked as made in a CUSMA country or not marked to the contrary, are considered originating and therefore entitled to the relevant CUSMA tariff preferences upon their importation into Canada.
